title: Sister Drama
itunes:title: Sister Drama
description:
Hello all I would like to ask your advice about my sister. I am 37 years old and I'm going through a divorce. My husband and I separated because he hit me. That was the second time he had done that and my father didn't raise no fool. I left him and filed a charge against him. My older sister was at the house and witnessed my husband hit me. Now during the time before we went to court my husband was frequently visiting my sister.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
